p: The nanocomposites can be used in various fields that encompass different biomedical applications, including cancer treatment, targeted drug delivery, molecular imaging, tissue engineering, and biosensors. Nanocomposite preparations using different noble metals have been incorporated in targeted drug delivery applications due to their known antimicrobial and anticancer properties. Different proteins and polysaccharides have been utilized to produce nanomaterials inducing antitumor effects [ 114].
